Package com.clanboards

package com.clanboards
Core public API for the Clash of Clans Java client.

Key types: - CocClient â€“ main entry point for endpoints - Data models like Clan, Player - Exceptions: NotFoundException, PrivateWarLogException

Design highlights: - Pluggable HTTP via HttpTransport - Token rotation (TokenRotator) and rate limiting (RateLimiter) - Tag normalization utilities in TagUtil

  • Related Packages

    Description
    com.clanboards.auth
    Authentication helpers for acquiring API tokens from developer.clashofclans.com.
    com.clanboards.examples
    Small runnable examples for manual smoke testing.
    com.clanboards.exceptions
     
    com.clanboards.http
    HTTP abstractions decoupling transport concerns from the client.
    com.clanboards.throttle
    Token-aware rate limiting utilities.
    com.clanboards.token
    Token rotation utilities for distributing requests across multiple tokens.
    com.clanboards.util
    General utilities used across the client.
    com.clanboards.wars
    Models and helpers for clan wars and league play.
